name: PIIMaskingGuardrailsAI
description: Detects and masks Personally Identifiable Information (PII). By default, PII values are masked during the request flow and restored in the response flow.

policyAttributes.name: name
policyAttributes.description: The name of the guardrail policy. This will be used for tracking purposes.

policyAttributes.name: piiEntities
policyAttributes.description: The PII entities to detect and mask.

policyAttributes.name: jsonPath
policyAttributes.description: The JSONPath expression used to extract content from the payload. If not specified, the entire payload will be used for validation.

policyAttributes.name: redact
policyAttributes.description: If set to true, identified PII values will be permanently replaced with "*****" (irreversible).
